article_title: How Obama Is Gearing Up to Ignore Lawmakers, Commit US to Significant Carbon Emissions Reductions
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: All indications are that Barack Obama intends not to present the Senate with whatever climate agreement comes out of Paris.
